description.x-y:
When the user knocks out a target
with this move, the user’s Attack stat
rises sharply.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
When the user knocks out a target
with this move, the user’s Attack stat
rises sharply.
description.sun-moon:
When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

description.sword-shield:
When the user knocks out a target with this move,
the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's Attack by two stages if it KOs the target.
